page.title: 06WOOTTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: to watch.There were a mixture of events and they included:flat races, obstacle races, relay and egg and spoon races. The children were in teams and points were awarded for placings in the races. The winning team was awarded a silver cup, also the best boy or girl was awarded a silver cup.The members of the winning team were given small prizes which were usually sweets. In the last week of the summer term the children are also involved in a number of other activities including a fourth year visit to the old school at Shorwell,day trips to Blackgang, Puckpool and a number of other interesting places.
